metadata.feature_description: Handles friendly URLs and URL rewriting during crawling operations.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify URL Rewriting Settings Are Accessible

steps.action: Navigated to Settings > SEO > URL Management
steps.expected: SEO settings page with URL Rewriter configuration should be accessible
steps.actual: Successfully accessed SEO page showing URL Management tab with GENERAL SETTINGS including URL REWRITER and URL REDIRECTS sections

steps.action: Verified URL Rewriter settings are displayed
steps.expected: URL Rewriter settings should show configuration options for friendly URLs
steps.actual: URL Rewriter section displayed with options: Standard Replacement Character ('-'), Concatenate Page URLs (On), Convert URLs to Lowercase (Off), Convert Accented Characters (Off), Set Default Site Language (On). URL Redirects section showed 'Redirect to Friendly URLs' enabled (On)

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test URL Generation with Friendly URLs Enabled

steps.action: Navigated to TEST URL tab in SEO settings
steps.expected: TEST URL tab should provide URL testing functionality
steps.actual: TEST URL tab displayed with 'TEST A PAGE URL' and 'TEST URL REWRITING' sections

steps.action: Selected 'Our Products' page and clicked 'Test URL' button
steps.expected: System should generate friendly URLs for the selected page
steps.actual: Successfully generated friendly URLs for all configured languages: http://localhost:8081/Our-Products, http://localhost:8081/en-us/Our-Products, http://localhost:8081/es-ar/Our-Products, http://localhost:8081/fr-fr/Our-Products, http://localhost:8081/de-de/Our-Products, http://localhost:8081/ar-er/Our-Products

steps.action: Entered friendly URL 'http://localhost:8081/en-us/Our-Products' in TEST URL REWRITING section
steps.expected: System should parse and rewrite the friendly URL to internal DNN format
steps.actual: URL was entered in the 'URL to Test' field

steps.expected: System should display rewriting result showing internal URL format, identified language, and identified page
steps.actual: Successfully displayed: Rewriting Result: 'Default.aspx?TabId=22&language=en-US', Identified Language/Culture: 'en-US', Identified Page: 'Our Products', Operation Messages: 'ActiveTab: 22/Our Products IsSecure: False'

observations: The URL Rewriting feature is primarily configured through code (UrlRewriter.cs, Spider.cs) and integrates with the DNN URL Provider system
URL rewriting settings in the SEO page allow configuration of friendly URL behavior including character replacement, case conversion, and language handling
The site is actively using friendly URLs as evidenced by the URL structure throughout the navigation (e.g., /en-us/Our-Products instead of Default.aspx?TabId=22)
The Search Crawler (Spider.cs) checks the 'UseFriendlyUrls' host setting and calls UrlRewriter.RewriteUrl() to process URLs during crawling operations
